name: The Last Acorns
description:
In humanity's strive for technology most of nature was destroyed. Now a single squirrel must defend its small world, the last standing tree on planet Earth.
In this game you play as said squirrel and shoot the demolition machines with your acorns to defend your tree.

You can still rate our game here : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/the-last-ac...
